Localization.Name: R6 Pro
Localization.Description: R6 Pro's rugged footwear is made to withstand wear and tear in even the most extreme environments, so even if you get knocked down, we're there to help you get back up again.

English.Name: R6 Pro
English.Description: R6 Pro's rugged footwear is made to withstand wear and tear in even the most extreme environments, so even if you get knocked down, we're there to help you get back up again.

Localization.Name: Baru Gloves Slate (Left Only)
Localization.Description: Ensure you hands are always dry and at the right temperature with the Baru gloves. An advanced sensor system protected by a metal plate on the back of the hand monitors and regulates conditions within the glove. A patented synthetic leather woven with special microfibers works with the sensors and a strap cuff provides a snug fit.
